report.title: Map a survey's occurrences
report.description: Produces a mappable report output for the occurrences in a survey. This report is provided for demonstration of the capabilities of Redicia and is subject to change.
report.query: SELECT #field_sql# FROM samples s JOIN occurrences o ON o.sample_id=s.id and o.deleted=false LEFT JOIN occurrence_images oi ON oi.occurrence_id=o.id and oi.deleted=false JOIN surveys su ON s.survey_id = su.id JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttl ON ttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id AND ttl.deleted=false JOIN taxa_taxon_lists ttlpref ON ttlpref.taxon_meaning_id=ttl.taxon_meaning_id AND ttlpref.preferred='t' AND ttlpref.deleted=false JOIN taxa tpref ON tpref.id=ttlpref.taxon_id AND tpref.deleted=false JOIN taxon_groups tg on tg.id=tpref.taxon_group_id and tg.deleted=false LEFT JOIN taxa tcommon ON tcommon.id=ttlpref.common_taxon_id AND tcommon.deleted=false LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id and l.deleted=false LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id=o.verified_by_id WHERE(CAST(s.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey#' OR '#survey#'='') AND o.record_status NOT IN ('I','R','T') AND st_intersects(s.geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913)) AND s.deleted=false AND #website_filter# #order_by#
report.field_sql: su.title, su.website_id, o.id as occurrence_id, s.date_start, s.date_end, s.date_type, tpref.taxon, tcommon.taxon as common, tg.title as taxon_group, s.entered_sref, COALESCE(l.name, s.location_name) as location_name, oi.path, CASE o.record_status WHEN 'C' THEN 'Data Entry Complete' WHEN 'V' THEN 'Verified' WHEN 'R' THEN 'Rejected' WHEN 'I' THEN 'In Progress' WHEN 'T' THEN 'Test' WHEN 'S' THEN 'Sent for verification' ELSE '' END AS record_status, st_astext(s.geom) as geom, u.username as verified_by

param.name: survey
param.description: Select the survey to return data for
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys
